description: Generate psychologically coherent data using known historical/literary figures. The LLM will infer personality profiles from biographical knowledge.

instructions.approach: For each respondent, the LLM should use its knowledge of their life, personality, and documented struggles to generate psychologically coherent responses to all instruments.
instructions.consistency: Responses should be internally consistent - a figure known for isolation should show patterns across related constructs (schemas, personality traits, etc.).
instructions.grounding: Base responses on biographical facts: known mental health issues, relationship patterns, life struggles, documented personality traits.
instructions.variation: Add realistic within-person variability - not all responses extreme, allow for nuance.
instructions.demographic_inference: Derive birth year, death year, profession, nationality from knowledge of each figure.

output_format.note: Output CSV should identify each respondent by name for interpretability
